changes: Implemented Professional Export Module with support for PDF, DOCX, and EPUB.
Added 'Book-Ready' formatting logic for industry-standard print exports.
Added Live Export Preview with real-time formatting visualization.
Enhanced PDF export stability and CSS variable resolution.
Added 'About' modal providing fundamental application context and developer attribution.
Added 'Load Tutorial' quick-start button for a mock project workspace.
Full support for Arabic RTL localization and CSS UI flipping.
Moved NLP model downloads to OS user directories (AppData) to drastically reduce executable sizes on Windows and Linux.
Added direct HuSpaCy package integration for Hungarian text parsing and tokenization natively.
Enhanced project configurations to never fail load states when creating new projects.
Resolved internal background TCP binding collisions on local server execution.
Enabled standalone executable building for Windows (.exe) and Linux.
Integrated Python backend natively into the Electron application.
Added external changelog and version tracking.
Added 'What's New' viewing panel on the startup screen.
Added global context menus for text editing.
